rename.from: panic: runtime error: index out of range [116] with length 116
rename.to: panic: runtime error: index out of range in processNeeded()

issue.title: Crash report
issue.body:
For some reason, Syncthing on my Android phone keeps crashing. I did not do anything special. Also, it wouldn't be problematic for me to wipe the installation to fix the issue. I just want to try and help finding the issue. 

### Version Information

    App Version: v1.6.1
    Syncthing Version: v1.6.1
    Android Version: Android 10

The log is below. If you find it annoying in here, I'll move it to pastebin, of course.
